title: Ep. 222: Fenty Feelings, Bug Bite Relief & The Latest Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 222: Fenty Feelings, Bug Bite Relief & The Latest Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: We review Fenty Skin products, ask doctors how to heal bug bites (and the marks they leave behind), and discuss the week’s beauty news: Selena Gomez’s new line, Rare Beauty; the inaugural class of BIPOC-owned beauty brands from the Credo for Change Men...
description:
We review Fenty Skin products, ask doctors how to heal bug bites (and the marks they leave behind), and discuss the week’s beauty news: Selena Gomez’s new line, Rare Beauty; the inaugural class of BIPOC-owned beauty brands from the Credo for Change Mentorship Program; About Face, a Quibi beauty show hosted by Rosie Huntington-Whiteley; Hair Loss Awareness month; and a fragrance that calls bullsh*t on the beauty industry. -- Want more Fat Mascara? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
